subject: API key authentication failing
body: I am trying to submit a job using the API but getting 401 errors. My API key is: sk-jobforge-abc123xyz. I am sending it in the X-API-Key header. What am I doing wrong?

subject: Job stuck in queued state for 2 hours
body: Critical pipeline is blocked. Job ID: job_987654321 has been queued for over 2 hours. This is urgent - our production deployment is stuck. Please help immediately!

subject: How do I upgrade my plan?
body: I am currently on the Starter plan and need more jobs per month. Can you help me upgrade to Pro? My account ID is ACC-12345.
